name: Microcraft Apps
description: A curated list of fully functional applications developed using the Microcraft framework.

apps.name: blog-platform
apps.description: A fully-featured blogging platform with user authentication, post creation, editing, and comment features.

apps.name: e-commerce-store
apps.description: An e-commerce application with product browsing, shopping cart, order management, and payment integration.

apps.name: todo-app
apps.description: A simple and intuitive task management application with drag-and-drop support and multiple category lists.

apps.name: chat-app
apps.description: A real-time messaging application with WebSocket support for instant communication.

apps.name: expense-tracker
apps.description: An application to manage your expenses, visualize budgets, and set financial goals with charts and reports.

apps.name: portfolio-builder
apps.description: A personal portfolio builder app allowing users to customize and deploy their portfolio websites with templates.

apps.name: social-media-dashboard
apps.description: A social media analytics dashboard that integrates with APIs like Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.
